headline: How the Story for Mercantile Bank Is Shifting After Analyst Target Updates
summary: Mercantile Bank's consensus analyst price target has slipped from $55.60 to $52.80, reflecting a modest decrease in the company's expected valuation. Analysts point to both the bank's continued strengths, such as solid asset quality and deposit growth, as well as new pressures, including higher expenses and underwhelming loan growth, to justify this revision. Stay tuned to see how shifting factors may continue to shape the outlook for Mercantile Bank stock in the months ahead. What Wall...
